title: Exploring the therapeutic mechanism of Miao nationality medicine Qijiao Shengbai capsule on leukopenia based on multi-omics, network pharmacology and experimental verification.
abstract: Leukopenia is caused by numerous factors, and modern drug therapies have obvious side effects, Qijiao Shengbai Capsule (QJSB) is a compound prescription developed from Miao medicine, widely used in clinical treatment of leukopenia. However, its mechanism of action for treating leukopenia remains unclear.
journal: Phytomedicine : international journal of phytotherapy and phytopharmacology
